notes.general: Build successful. Detected FloatingChatWidget (dynamic import) in RootLayout rendering immediately, likely causing TBT on all pages.

home.lazy_loading: LazySection heavily used. RemotionVideoEmbedWrapper also lazy loaded.

appointments.optimization: PatientPortal lazy loaded. BookingHeroContent server rendered.

proposed_fix: Defer FloatingChatWidget loading using an idle timeout (4s) or interaction (hover/click) to reduce initial TBT.
